reviewText:
I ENJOYED THE ACCURACY OF THIS BIBLE BASED MOVIE.  I WOULD LIKE TO SEE MORE LIKE IT.
THANKS, HELEN GWYNN
Great classic!

Very nice movie and easy to understand...well done!

I would recommend it. Hope to see more movie like this...Can't wait to see SON OF GOD in this site too.
I enjoyed this very much, It had good understanding to the bible story. And was very valuable to life's lessons and faith in God's word
Best version ever of Gideon. We use this for bringing the Bible to life for our son. Great way to teach.
I enjoyed this movie but would have enjoyed it a little more if the picture quality had not been so grainy/fuzzy.
The picture quality says it all, it's been done poorly, so you know that this movie is old, the story line is not even close to scripture!
Like all biblical films, they would have a better film if stayed close to the Bible narrative instead of "think so maybe so"
It was ok.
It was fairly Biblically accurate.
Hated it boring!!!
Thought provoking.
I  learn some stuff I did not know
The movie was okay, but that's the best I can say about it.
I love biblical history I did not complete watch but what I did see its a great introduction to the bible and factual
it is so good to be reminded that these biblical characters were real people in real life situations - tempted with choices!
Old but good

Mostly forgettable sword and sandal bible movie. Worth a quick watch for the destruction of the the temple. It's kind of funny watching the little miniature dolls falling down.

I am a student of the Bible.  The book of Judges is one of my favorites.  Both Gideon & Samson were judges of God's people.  This movie allowed me to visualize these 2 judges as enacted out on the screen.  I appreciated seeing this part of the book of Judges come alive.  One discrepancy I noticed was that the angel in the movie spoke to Samson's Father about his birth.  When actually in the Bible the Angel spoke to Samson's Mother 2 times about his birth.
I enjoyed the movie.
It is aweful and the Samson one is too dark to see sometimes. Older than dirt!
Classic Bible story
I expected more bilblical narrative.
Quality was poor
Nice movie but not like the bible say
Awesome movie. It was very scriptural. I loved it. It's a shame more of them were not made by this company.
I was glad to get a movie from the book of Judges. This movie was okay but I wish it wasn'[t so Hollywood.
Terrible
